verses.verse: וַיֶּאֶסֹ֧ף <S%H622><s%> gathered יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שְׁכֶ֑מָה <S%H7927><s%> to Shechem וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> and called לְזִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> for the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּלְרָאשָׁ֗יו <S%H7218><s%> and for their heads וּלְשֹֽׁפְטָיו֙ <S%H8199><s%> and for their judges וּלְשֹׁ֣טְרָ֔יו <S%H7860><s%> and for their officers וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <S%H3320><s%> and they presented לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> themselves before הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on the other side הַנָּהָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> of the flood יָשְׁב֤וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> Your fathers מֵֽעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> in old time תֶּ֛רַח <S%H8646><s%> [even] Terah אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> the father אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham וַאֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> and the father נָח֑וֹר <S%H5152><s%> of Nachor וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> and they served אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <S%H312><s%> other

וָ֠אֶקַּח <S%H3947><s%> And I took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִיכֶ֤ם <S%H1><s%> your father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> Abraham מֵעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> from the other side הַנָּהָ֔ר <S%H5104><s%> of the flood וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and led אוֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> him throughout all the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan [וָאֶרֶב כ] (וָאַרְבֶּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> abundance ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְע֔וֹ <S%H2233><s%> his seed וָֽאֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and gave ל֖וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> him Isaac

וָאֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> And I gave לְיִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> unto Isaac אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> and Esau וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> and I gave לְעֵשָׂ֜ו <S%H6215><s%> unto Esau אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֤ר <S%H2022><s%> mount שֵׂעִיר֙ <S%H8165><s%> Seir לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אוֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְיַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> it but Jacob וּבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and his children יָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> went down מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt

וָאֶשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> I sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> also and Aaron וָאֶגֹּ֣ף <S%H5062><s%> and I plagued אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> according to that which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> I did בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7130><s%> among וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> them and afterward הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <S%H3318><s%> I brought you out אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וָֽאוֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> And I brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> your fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וַתָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and ye came הַיָּ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> unto the sea וַיִּרְדְּפ֨וּ <S%H7291><s%> pursued מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian אַחֲרֵ֧י <S%H310><s%> after אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H1><s%> your fathers בְּרֶ֥כֶב <S%H7393><s%> with chariots וּבְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6571><s%> and horsemen יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> unto the Red

וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ <S%H6817><s%> And when they cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> he put מַֽאֲפֵ֜ל <S%H3990><s%> darkness בֵּינֵיכֶ֣ם ׀ <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הַמִּצְרִ֗ים <S%H4713><s%> between you and the Egyptians וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> and brought עָלָ֤יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> the sea וַיְכַסֵּ֔הוּ <S%H3680><s%> upon them and covered וַתִּרְאֶ֙ינָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> have seen עֵינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> them and your eyes אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> what I have done בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וַתֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> and ye dwelt בַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> season רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> a long

[וָאָבִאָה כ] (וָאָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> abide ק) אֶתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you into the land הָאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites הַיּוֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> and they fought אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> and I וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> with you and I gave אוֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> בְּיֶדְכֶם֙ <S%H3027><s%> them into your hand וַתִּֽירְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> that ye might possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> their land וָאַשְׁמִידֵ֖ם <S%H8045><s%> and I destroyed מִפְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> them from before

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose בָּלָ֤ק <S%H1111><s%> Then Balak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צִפּוֹר֙ <S%H6834><s%> of Zippor מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <S%H3898><s%> and warred בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> and called לְבִלְעָ֥ם <S%H1109><s%> Balaam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְּע֖וֹר <S%H1160><s%> of Beor לְקַלֵּ֥ל <S%H7043><s%> to curse אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> was not אָבִ֖יתִי <S%H14><s%> But I would לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> not hearken לְבִלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam וַיְבָ֤רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> therefore he blessed בָּרוֹךְ֙ <S%H1288><s%> you still אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וָאַצִּ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> so I delivered אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> you out of his hand

וַתַּעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> And ye went over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּן֮ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וַתָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְרִיחוֹ֒ <S%H3405><s%> unto Jericho וַיִּלָּחֲמ֣וּ <S%H3898><s%> fought בָכֶ֣ם בַּעֲלֵֽי־ <S%H1167><s%> and the men יְ֠רִיחוֹ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho הָֽאֱמֹרִ֨י <S%H567><s%> against you the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֜י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <S%H3669><s%> and the Canaanites וְהַֽחִתִּי֙ <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittites וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֔י <S%H1622><s%> and the Girgashites הַֽחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and I delivered אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> them into your hand

וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> And I sent לִפְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצִּרְעָ֔ה <S%H6880><s%> the hornet וַתְּגָ֤רֶשׁ <S%H1644><s%> you which drave them out אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> from before שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> you [even] the two מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֑י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> by בְחַרְבְּךָ֖ <S%H2719><s%> [but] not with thy sword וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or בְקַשְׁתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7198><s%> nor with thy bow

וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> And I have given לָכֶ֜ם אֶ֣רֶץ ׀ <S%H776><s%> you a land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not יָגַ֣עְתָּ <S%H3021><s%> for which ye did not labour בָּ֗הּ וְעָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> and cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not בְנִיתֶ֔ם <S%H1129><s%> which ye built וַתֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> not and ye dwell בָּהֶ֑ם כְּרָמִ֤ים <S%H3754><s%> in them of the vineyards וְזֵיתִים֙ <S%H2132><s%> and oliveyards אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נְטַעְתֶּ֔ם <S%H5193><s%> which ye planted אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you אֹכְלִֽים׃ <S%H398><s%> not do ye eat

וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יְר֧אוּ <S%H3372><s%> Now therefore fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְעִבְד֥וּ <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּתָמִ֣ים <S%H8549><s%> him in sincerity וּבֶֽאֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> and in truth וְהָסִ֣ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> and put away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> the gods אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which עָבְד֨וּ <S%H5647><s%> served אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H1><s%> which your fathers בְּעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on the other side הַנָּהָר֙ <S%H5104><s%> of the flood וּבְמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> and in Egypt וְעִבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD

וְאִם֩ <S%H518><s%> If רַ֨ע <S%H7451><s%> adversity בְּֽעֵינֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H5869><s%> whom לַעֲבֹ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> to serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בַּחֲר֨וּ <S%H977><s%> choose לָכֶ֣ם הַיּוֹם֮ <S%H3117><s%> you this day אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> unto you תַעֲבֹדוּן֒ <S%H5647><s%> ye will serve אִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> whether אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִ֞ים <S%H430><s%> whether the gods אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> served אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> which your fathers אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which [בְּעֵבֶר כ] (מֵעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> beyond ק) הַנָּהָ֔ר <S%H5104><s%> of the flood וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> whether אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> or the gods הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> ye dwell בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <S%H776><s%> in whose land וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I וּבֵיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> but as for me and my house נַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> we will serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ

וַיַּ֤עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And the people וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said חָלִ֣ילָה <S%H2486><s%> God forbid לָּ֔נוּ מֵעֲזֹ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> that we should forsake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> to serve אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <S%H312><s%> other

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God הוּא֩ <S%H1931><s%> who הַמַּעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> he [it is] that brought us up אֹתָ֧נוּ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבוֹתֵ֛ינוּ <S%H1><s%> and our fathers מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house עֲבָדִ֑ים <S%H5650><s%> of bondage וַאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> and who עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> and which did לְעֵינֵ֗ינוּ <S%H5869><s%> in our sight אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹת֤וֹת <S%H226><s%> signs הַגְּדֹלוֹת֙ <S%H1419><s%> those great הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַֽיִּשְׁמְרֵ֗נוּ <S%H8104><s%> and preserved בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> us in all the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָלַ֣כְנוּ <S%H1980><s%> wherein we went בָ֔הּ וּבְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> and among all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose עָבַ֖רְנוּ <S%H5674><s%> whom we passed בְּקִרְבָּֽם׃ <S%H7130><s%> through

וַיְגָ֨רֶשׁ <S%H1644><s%> drave out יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> us all the people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֱמֹרִ֛י <S%H567><s%> even the Amorites יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִפָּנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> from before גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> ourselves נַעֲבֹ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> [therefore] will we also serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> He אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> for he [is] our God ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תֽוּכְלוּ֙ <S%H3201><s%> Ye cannot לַעֲבֹ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> God קְדֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H6918><s%> for he [is] an holy ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֵֽל־ <S%H410><s%> God קַנּ֣וֹא <S%H7072><s%> he [is] a jealous ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> He will not יִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> he will not forgive לְפִשְׁעֲכֶ֖ם <S%H6588><s%> your transgressions וּלְחַטֹּאותֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> nor your sins

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua לֹ֕א <S%H3808><s%> No כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD נַעֲבֹֽד׃ <S%H5647><s%> Nay but we will serve

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> said הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> our God נַעֲבֹ֔ד <S%H5647><s%> will we serve וּבְקוֹל֖וֹ <S%H6963><s%> and his voice נִשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> will we obey

וַיִּכְרֹ֨ת <S%H3772><s%> made יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <S%H3091><s%> So Joshua בְּרִ֛ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> with the people בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and set ל֛וֹ חֹ֥ק <S%H2706><s%> them a statute וּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> and an ordinance בִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H7927><s%> in Shechem

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הָאֶ֤בֶן <S%H68><s%> Behold this stone הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become בָּ֣נוּ לְעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5713><s%> shall be a witness כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> it שָׁמְעָ֗ה <S%H8085><s%> unto us for it hath heard אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִמְרֵ֣י <S%H561><s%> all the words יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> which he spake עִמָּ֑נוּ <S%H5973><s%> with וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become בָכֶם֙ לְעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5713><s%> unto us it shall be therefore a witness פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> so תְּכַחֲשׁ֖וּן <S%H3584><s%> unto you lest ye deny בֵּאלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וַיְשַׁלַּ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> depart יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> So Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> let the people אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְנַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5159><s%> unto his inheritance פ
